content: प्रक्रिया {@--1@} Way, manner, conduct. {@--2@} A rite, ceremony. {@--3@} The bearing of royal insignia. {@--4@} High position, elevation. {@--5@} A chapter or section (of a book); as in उणादिप्रक्रिया. {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Etymological formation. {@--7@} A privilege. {@--8@} An introductory chapter of a work. {@--9@} Rules for the formation of words.
